title: Tech bounce lifts indices and sentiment - Economic Times
content: Tech bounce lifts indices and sentiment  Economic Times
description: Indian equities jumped over 1% on Monday a day before the Union Budget, with beaten-down technology stocks leading the gains. Local stocks were mirroring the strength in global markets triggered by the rebound on Wall Street on Friday. The Sensex ended up 752.26 points or 1.32% at 57,952.49 while the Nifty closed 237.90 points or 1.4% higher at 17,339.85.
